TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ZipArchive extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 代表 zip 封存格式的壓縮檔封裝。

span.span: Represents a package of compressed files in the zip archive format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 管理的 zip 封存和其檔案項目方法分散到三個類別： ， ，和。The methods for manipulating zip archives and their file entries are spread across three classes: , , and . |以To|使用Use| |--------|---------| |建立 zip 封存的目錄Create a zip archive from a directory|| |擷取目錄的 zip 封存的內容Extract the contents of a zip archive to a directory|| |將新檔案加入至現有的 zip 封存Add new files to an existing zip archive|| |從 zip 封存中擷取Retrieve a file from a zip archive|| |擷取 zip 封存中的所有檔案Retrieve all the files from a zip archive|| |開啟單一檔案的 zip 封存中所包含之資料流Open a stream to a single file contained in a zip archive|| |從 zip 封存中刪除檔案Delete a file from a zip archive|| 當您建立新的項目時，檔案會壓縮，並新增至 zip 封裝。When you create a new entry, the file is compressed and added to the zip package. 方法可讓您指定的目錄階層時，加入項目。The method enables you to specify a directory hierarchy when adding the entry. 您包含新的項目 zip 封裝內的相對路徑。You include the relative path of the new entry within the zip package. 例如，建立新的項目與相對路徑`AddedFolder\NewFile.txt`名為 AddedFolder 的目錄中建立壓縮的文字檔。For example, creating a new entry with a relative path of `AddedFolder\NewFile.txt` creates a compressed text file in a directory named AddedFolder. 如果您參考`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`組件在您的專案，您可以存取三個擴充方法 (從類別) 的類別： ， ，和。If you reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project, you can access three extension methods (from the class) for the class: , , and . 這些擴充方法可讓您壓縮和解壓縮檔案的項目內容。These extension methods enable you to compress and decompress the contents of the entry to a file. `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`組件不是供[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]應用程式。The `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly is not available for [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 在[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]應用程式，您可以壓縮和解壓縮檔案使用或類別，或者您可以使用[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]類型[壓縮](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=246357)和[解壓縮程式](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=246358)。In [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps, you can compress and decompress files by using the or class, or you can use the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] types [Compressor](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=246357) and [Decompressor](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=246358). ## Examples 第一個範例示範如何建立新的項目，並使用資料流寫入其中。The first example shows how to create a new entry and write to it by using a stream. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/vb/program1.vb#1)] 下列範例會示範如何開啟 zip 封存，並逐一查看集合的項目。The following example shows how to open a zip archive and iterate through the collection of entries. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program1.vb#1)] 第三個範例示範如何使用擴充方法，從現有的檔案的 zip 封存中建立新的項目，並解壓縮的封存內容。The third example shows how to use extension methods to create a new entry in a zip archive from an existing file and extract the archive contents. 您必須參考`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`來執行程式碼的組件。You must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly to execute the code. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program3.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`mode`參數設定為，資料流必須支援讀取。If the `mode` parameter is set to , the stream must support reading. 如果`mode`參數設定為，資料流必須支援寫入。If the `mode` parameter is set to , the stream must support writing. 如果`mode`參數設定為，資料流必須支援讀取、 寫入和搜尋。If the `mode` parameter is set to , the stream must support reading, writing, and seeking.

exception.span: 資料流已經關閉，或資料流的容量不符合模式。

span.span: The stream is already closed, or the capabilities of the stream do not match the mode.
is .

span.span: The contents of the stream could not be interpreted as a zip archive.

span.span: is and an entry is missing from the archive or is corrupt and cannot be read.

exception.span: 是 ，而且項目太大，無法放入記憶體。

span.span: is and an entry is too large to fit into memory.

MemberSignature.Value: public ZipArchive (System.IO.Stream stream, System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode mode, bool leaveOpen, System.Text.Encoding entryNameEncoding);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream stream, valuetype System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode mode, bool leaveOpen, class System.Text.Encoding entryNameEncoding) cil managed
public: ZipArchive(System::IO::Stream ^ stream, System::IO::Compression::ZipArchiveMode mode, bool leaveOpen, System::Text::Encoding ^ entryNameEncoding);

span.span: The input or output stream.

param.name: mode
param.span: 其中一個列舉值，指出是否使用 zip 封存讀取、建立或更新項目。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether the zip archive is used to read, create, or update entries.

param.name: leaveOpen
param.span: 表示在處置 物件之後，將資料流保持開啟；否則為 。

span.span: to leave the stream open after the object is disposed; otherwise, .

param.name: entryNameEncoding
param.span: 在此封存中讀取或寫入項目名稱時要使用的編碼方式。

span.span: The encoding to use when reading or writing entry names in this archive.

param.span: 只有需要編碼以與 Zip 封存工具和程式庫互通，且這類工具和程式庫不支援項目名稱使用 UTF-8 編碼時，才指定此參數的值。

span.span: Specify a value for this parameter only when an encoding is required for interoperability with zip archive tools and libraries that do not support UTF-8 encoding for entry names.

summary.span: 在指定之模式的指定資料流上，初始化 類別的新執行個體，使用項目名稱的指定編碼方式，並選擇性地保留資料流開啟狀態。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class on the specified stream for the specified mode, uses the specified encoding for entry names, and optionally leaves the stream open.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`mode`參數設定為，資料流必須支援讀取。If the `mode` parameter is set to , the stream must support reading. 如果`mode`參數設定為，資料流必須支援寫入。If the `mode` parameter is set to , the stream must support writing. 如果`mode`參數設定為，資料流必須支援讀取、 寫入和搜尋。If the `mode` parameter is set to , the stream must support reading, writing, and seeking. 當您開啟 zip 封存檔案進行讀取和`entryNameEncoding`設`null`，項目名稱解碼根據下列規則：When you open a zip archive file for reading and `entryNameEncoding` is set to `null`, entry names are decoded according to the following rules: - 當未設定的語言編碼 （以本機檔案標頭的一般用途的位元旗標） 旗標時，目前的系統預設字碼頁用來解碼的項目名稱。When the language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is not set, the current system default code page is used to decode the entry name. - 當設定的語言編碼旗標時，utf-8 用來解碼項目名稱。When the language encoding flag is set, UTF-8 is used to decode the entry name. 當您開啟 zip 封存檔案進行讀取和`entryNameEncoding`以外設定為值`null`，項目名稱解碼根據下列規則：When you open a zip archive file for reading and `entryNameEncoding` is set to a value other than `null`, entry names are decoded according to the following rules: - 當語言編碼旗標未設定，指定`entryNameEncoding`用來解碼的項目名稱。When the language encoding flag is not set, the specified `entryNameEncoding` is used to decode the entry name. - 當設定的語言編碼旗標時，utf-8 用來解碼項目名稱。When the language encoding flag is set, UTF-8 is used to decode the entry name. 當您撰寫封存檔案和`entryNameEncoding`設`null`，項目名稱會編碼根據下列規則：When you write to archive files and `entryNameEncoding` is set to `null`, entry names are encoded according to the following rules: - 包含 ASCII 範圍以外的字元的項目名稱、 語言編碼旗標已設定，而且項目名稱會使用 utf-8 編碼。For entry names that contain characters outside the ASCII range, the language encoding flag is set, and entry names are encoded by using UTF-8. - 用於項目只能包含 ASCII 字元的名稱，未設定的語言編碼旗標，並使用目前的系統預設字碼頁來進行編碼的項目名稱。For entry names that contain only ASCII characters, the language encoding flag is not set, and entry names are encoded by using the current system default code page. 當您撰寫封存檔案和`entryNameEncoding`以外設定為值`null`，指定`entryNameEncoding`用來編碼為位元組的項目名稱。When you write to archive files and `entryNameEncoding` is set to a value other than `null`, the specified `entryNameEncoding` is used to encode the entry names into bytes. 只有當指定的編碼方式為 utf-8 編碼時設定的語言編碼旗標 （以本機檔案標頭的一般用途的位元旗標）。The language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is set only when the specified encoding is a UTF-8 encoding.

summary.span: 建立 zip 封存中的空項目。

span.span: Creates an empty entry in the zip archive.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry CreateEntry (string entryName);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry CreateEntry(string entryName) cil managed
Public Function CreateEntry (entryName As String) As ZipArchiveEntry
public: System::IO::Compression::ZipArchiveEntry ^ CreateEntry(System::String ^ entryName);

param.name: entryName
param.span: 指定要建立之項目名稱的路徑 (相對於封存的根目錄)。

span.span: A path, relative to the root of the archive, that specifies the name of the entry to be created.

summary.span: 在 zip 封存中建立具有指定之路徑和項目名稱的空項目。

span.span: Creates an empty entry that has the specified path and entry name in the zip archive.
An empty entry in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `entryName`字串應該會反映您想要建立 zip 封存中的項目相對路徑。The `entryName` string should reflect the relative path of the entry you want to create within the zip archive. 沒有任何限制，在您提供的字串。There is no restriction on the string you provide. 不過，如果它不格式化為相對路徑，會建立項目，擷取 zip 封存的內容時，可能會發生例外狀況。However, if it is not formatted as a relative path, the entry is created, but you may get an exception when you extract the contents of the zip archive. 如果封存中已經存在具有指定的路徑和名稱的項目，第二個項目會建立具有相同的路徑和名稱。If an entry with the specified path and name already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with the same path and name. 值新項目的屬性設定為目前的時間。The value of the property for the new entry is set to the current time. 使用預設的壓縮層級基礎的壓縮演算法壓縮項目。The entry is compressed using the default compression level of the underlying compression algorithm. 如果您想要指定不同的壓縮層級，使用方法。If you want to specify a different compression level, use the method. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何建立項目，並使用資料流寫入其中。The following example shows how to create an entry and write to it by using a stream. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/vb/program1.vb#1)]

span.span: is .
is .
The zip archive does not support writing.
The zip archive has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry CreateEntry (string entryName, System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel compressionLevel);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry CreateEntry(string entryName, valuetype System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel compressionLevel) cil managed
public: System::IO::Compression::ZipArchiveEntry ^ CreateEntry(System::String ^ entryName, System::IO::Compression::CompressionLevel compressionLevel);

param.name: entryName
param.span: 指定要建立之項目名稱的路徑 (相對於封存的根目錄)。

span.span: A path, relative to the root of the archive, that specifies the name of the entry to be created.

param.name: compressionLevel
param.span: 其中一個列舉值，指出建立項目時是否要強調速度或壓縮的效益。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to emphasize speed or compression effectiveness when creating the entry.

summary.span: 在 zip 封存中建立具有指定之項目名稱和壓縮等級的空項目。

span.span: Creates an empty entry that has the specified entry name and compression level in the zip archive.
An empty entry in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `entryName`字串應該會反映您想要建立 zip 封存中的項目相對路徑。The `entryName` string should reflect the relative path of the entry you want to create within the zip archive. 沒有任何限制，在您提供的字串。There is no restriction on the string you provide. 不過，如果它不格式化為相對路徑，會建立項目，擷取 zip 封存的內容時，可能會發生例外狀況。However, if it is not formatted as a relative path, the entry is created, but you may get an exception when you extract the contents of the zip archive. 如果封存中已經存在具有指定名稱的項目，第二個項目會建立具有相同名稱。If an entry with the specified name already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with the same name. 值新項目的屬性設定為目前的時間。The value of the property for the new entry is set to the current time. 設定`compressionLevel`參數如果您想要壓縮檔案盡量。Set the `compressionLevel` parameter to if you want the file to be compressed as much as possible. 設定`compressionLevel`參數唯一，如果您擔心，壓縮作業將不會完成速度不夠快您的案例。Set the `compressionLevel` parameter to only if you are concerned that the compression operation will not complete quickly enough for your scenario. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何以最佳的壓縮層級建立的項目。The following example shows how to create an entry with the optimal compression level. 它也會將寫入新項目所使用的資料流。It also writes to the new entry by using a stream. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/vb/program2.vb#2)]

summary.span: 釋放由 物件使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Dispose ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
Public Sub Dispose ()
public: virtual void Dispose();

summary.span: 將 類別的目前執行個體所使用的資源釋出。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法完成寫入封存，所使用的資源全部釋出物件。This method finishes writing the archive and releases all resources used by the object. 除非您使用建構的物件建構函式多載，然後設定其`leaveOpen`參數`true`，所有基礎資料流已關閉且不再可供後續的寫入作業。Unless you construct the object by using the constructor overload and set its `leaveOpen` parameter to `true`, all underlying streams are closed and no longer available for subsequent write operations. 當您完成使用此執行個體，呼叫釋放此執行個體所使用的所有資源。When you are finished using this instance of , call to release all resources used by this instance. 您應該刪除進一步參考執行個體，讓記憶體回收行程可以回收的記憶體，而不是讓它維持在運作進行最終處理的執行個體。You should eliminate further references to this instance so that the garbage collector can reclaim the memory of the instance instead of keeping it alive for finalization. 呼叫方法，其中包含表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源的程式碼。 calls the method, which contains the code to release managed and unmanaged resources. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: virtual void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示完成寫入封存並釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to finish writing the archive and release unmanaged and managed resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 由 和 方法呼叫以釋放 類別之目前執行個體所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性完成封存的寫入以及釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Called by the and methods to release the unmanaged resources used by the current instance of the class, and optionally finishes writing the archive and releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`disposing`設`true`，所有基礎資料流已關閉且不再適用於後續的寫入作業，除非您使用建構的物件建構函式多載，然後設定其`leaveOpen`參數`true`.If `disposing` is set to `true`, all underlying streams are closed and no longer available for subsequent write operations, unless you construct the object by using the constructor overload and set its `leaveOpen` parameter to `true`. 會呼叫這個方法只由公用和方法。 請勿直接呼叫這個方法。This method is called only by the public and methods; do not call this method directly. 當您實作 dispose 模式的布林參數方法應使用，如下所示：When you implement the dispose pattern, the Boolean parameter of the method should be used as follows: - 目前物件的方法應該呼叫布林參數設定為與`true`表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源。The method of the current object should call with the Boolean parameter set to `true` to release both managed and unmanaged resources. - 目前物件的方法應該呼叫布林參數設定為與`false`表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。The method of the current object should call with the Boolean parameter set to `false` to release only unmanaged resources. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry> Entries { get; }

Public ReadOnly Property Entries As ReadOnlyCollection(Of ZipArchiveEntry)

public: property System::Collections::ObjectModel::ReadOnlyCollection<System::IO::Compression::ZipArchiveEntry ^> ^ Entries { System::Collections::ObjectModel::ReadOnlyCollection<System::IO::Compression::ZipArchiveEntry ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前 zip 封存中所包含項目的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of entries that are currently in the zip archive.

value.span: 目前 zip 封存中所包含項目的集合。

span.span: The collection of entries that are currently in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以擷取整個集合的項目。Use the property to retrieve the entire collection of entries. 使用方法依名稱擷取單一項目。Use the method to retrieve a single entry by name. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何開啟 zip 封存，並逐一查看集合的項目。The following example shows how to open a zip archive and iterate through the collection of entries. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program1.vb#1)]

span.span: The zip archive does not support reading.
The zip archive has been disposed.

exception.span: Zip 封存已損毀，且無法擷取它的項目。

span.span: The zip archive is corrupt, and its entries cannot be retrieved.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry GetEntry (string entryName);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry GetEntry(string entryName) cil managed
Public Function GetEntry (entryName As String) As ZipArchiveEntry
public: System::IO::Compression::ZipArchiveEntry ^ GetEntry(System::String ^ entryName);

param.name: entryName
param.span: 識別要擷取之項目的路徑 (相對於封存的根目錄)。

span.span: A path, relative to the root of the archive, that identifies the entry to retrieve.

summary.span: 在 zip 封存中擷取指定項目的包裝函式。

span.span: Retrieves a wrapper for the specified entry in the zip archive.

returns.span: 封存中之指定項目的包裝函式，如果項目不存在於封存中則為 。

span.span: A wrapper for the specified entry in the archive; if the entry does not exist in the archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有指定的名稱的多個項目存在於封存檔中，會傳回第一個。If multiple entries that have the specified name exist in the archive, the first one is returned. 項目的名稱相較於`entryName`使用序數比較。The name of the entry is compared to `entryName` using ordinal comparison. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來擷取項目。The following example shows how to use the method to retrieve an entry. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/vb/program2.vb#2)]

is .

Public ReadOnly Property Mode As ZipArchiveMode

summary.span: 取得值，描述 zip 封存可以在項目上執行的動作類型。

span.span: Gets a value that describes the type of action the zip archive can perform on entries.

value.span: 其中一個列舉值，其描述 zip 封存可以在項目上執行的動作類型 (讀取、建立或更新)。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that describes the type of action (read, create, or update) the zip archive can perform on entries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的值屬性，當您建立的執行個體類別。You specify a value for the property when you create an instance of the class. 使用或建構函式來提供值給屬性。Use the or constructor to provide a value for the property.
